00047 function isValidTime($time_)
00048 {
00049   $matches = NULL;
00050   preg_match('/^([\d]{1,2})[:]{1}([\d]{2})[:]{1}([\d]{2})$/', $time_, $matches);
00051 
00052   if
00053   (
00054     empty($matches) ||
00055     $matches[1] < 0 ||
00056     $matches[1] >= 24 ||
00057     $matches[2] < 0 ||
00058     $matches[2] >= 60 ||
00059     $matches[3] < 0 ||
00060     $matches[3] >= 60
00061   )
00062   {
00063     return false;
00064   }
00065   else
00066   {
00067     return true;
00068   }
